short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display unread notifications count from Mastodon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension that retrieves the number of new notifications for a Mastodon account at regular intervals. If there are new notifications, the count will be displayed on the icon. Users can easily set it up after installation to start using it.

> https://github.com/eallion/mastodonify
